response.overview: Don't mix business and pleasure...! How many times have we heard this warning? While trying to tackle the impossible task of making money from an old 70s boat, our protagonists keep a healthy distance from each other. But at the end of the day, after all the hard work, when only the sun and the waves are left, who wouldn't fall into the temptation of fucking an attractive business partner?
response.title: Boat Buddies with Benefits
